title: Match Event Schema
description: Schema for FOGIS API match event data

__type.description: Type identifier for the match event object

matchhandelseid.description: Unique identifier for the match event

matchid.description: ID of the match this event belongs to

matchhandelsetypid.description: Type ID of the event (6 = goal, 20 = yellow card, 31 = period start, etc.)

matchhandelsetypnamn.description: Human-readable name of the event type

matchlagid.description: ID of the team involved in the event

matchlagnamn.description: Name of the team involved in the event

trojnummer.description: Jersey number of the player involved in the event

spelareid.description: ID of the player involved in the event

spelarenamn.description: Name of the player involved in the event

matchminut.description: Minute in the match when the event occurred

hemmamal.description: Goals for the home team after this event

bortamal.description: Goals for the away team after this event

period.description: Period in which the event occurred (1 = first half, 2 = second half, etc.)

matchhandelsetypmedforstallningsandring.description: Whether the event type changes the score

matchhandelsetypanvanderannonseradtid.description: Whether the event type uses announced time

planpositionx.description: X position on the pitch where the event occurred

planpositiony.description: Y position on the pitch where the event occurred

relateradTillMatchhandelseID.description: ID of a related match event (e.g., second yellow card related to red card)

sekund.description: Second in the minute when the event occurred

spelareid2.description: ID of the second player involved in the event (e.g., for substitutions)

matchdeltagareid2.description: ID of the second match participant (e.g., for substitutions)
